about_the_game:
Enhance the visual appeal of your game with our 1000+ Items Icons made in 16x16 Pixel Art Asset Pack. This pack features a wide range of high-quality icons, all created in a charming pixel art style.

With over 1.000 icons to choose from, you'll have everything you need to create a visually stunning game. The icons cover a broad range of categories, including food, weapons, tools, armors, and more, making it easy to find the perfect icon for your game.

Asset Content:

128 Swords/Blades!
64 Staffs!
64 Axes!
64 Bows!
64 Spears!
Amours!
Helms!
Boots!
Gloves!
Belts!
Rings!
Necklaces!
Ores!
Foods!
Fishes!
Misc Items!

Variation of colors!
3 Sprite sheets! (No background, Black & Orange Background)

Terms of Use:

This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
OK to be used in Commercial projects
Contents can be edited
OK for use in games with gore
OK for use in adult-rated games
